alert.note: Alert for Central Oahu; Ewa Plain; Koolau Leeward; Koolau Windward; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Waianae Mountains (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 9:10PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY THROUGH 1045 PM HST... At 909 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Kahuku to near Nanakuli. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waipio, Hauula, Mililani, Wahiawa, Waialua, Schofield Barracks, Laie, Punaluu, Waianae, Kunia, Wheeler Field, Kapolei, Waikele, Waikane, Barbers Point, Ewa Beach, Waiahole, Nanakuli, Pearl City, and Waipahu. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
